resources.string: Q1 - Which of the following is true about php.ini file?
The PHP configuration file, php.ini, is the final and most immediate way to affect PHP\'s functionality
The php.ini file is read each time PHP is initialized
Q2 - Which of the following is correct about variable naming rules?
Variable names must begin with a letter or underscore character
A variable name can consist of numbers, letters, underscores
You cannot use characters like + , - , % , ( , ) . & , etc in a variable name
Q3 - Which of the following is correct about constants?
To define a constant you have to use define() function
To retrieve the value of a constant, you have to simply specify its name
Q4 - Which of the following function is used to locate a string within a string?
Q5 - Which of the following function can be used to get an array in the reverse order?
Q6 - Which of the following function checks if a specified value exists in an array?
Q7 - Which of the following is used to access session variables in PHP?
Q8 - Which of the following is an associative array containing session variables available to the current script?
Q9 - Which of the following method of Exception class returns array of the backtrace?
Q10 - Which of the following method acts as a destructor function in a PHP class?
